text: velyesta`fifi-llezine la yecidune nikahan hatta yugniyehumu-llahu min fadlih. vellezine yebtegune-lkitabe mimma meleket eymanukum fekatibuhum in `alimtum fihim hayra. veatuhum mim mali-llahi-llezi atakum. vela tukrihu feteyatikum `ale-lbigai in eradne tehassunel litebtegu `arada-lhayati-ddunya. vemey yukrihhunne feinne-llahe mim ba`di ikrahihinne gafurur rahim
